description:
This VTC QuickStart! - QuickBooks 2013 course focuses on the fundamental skills required to build a solid foundation for your businessís financials. Author and expert Lauri Sowa begins by demonstrating what youíll need to know to run your accounting system in QuickBooks. She shows you how to record income, pay bills, and set up your company with its chart of accounts and banking. She also covers the new features in this version of QuickBooks. This title is a self-paced software training course delivered via pre-recorded video. We do not provide additional information outside of the posted content.

Work files for this course can be downloaded from the first lecture.
title: QuickStart! - QuickBooks 2013
